mapper.select: select * from artist order by registered_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into artist (name, birth, agency, nationality, introduction, registered_date) values (#{name}, #{birth}, #{agency}, #{nationality}, #{introduction}, now())
mapper.select: select * from artist where name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
mapper.update: update artist set name = #{dto.name}, birth = #{dto.birth}, agency = #{dto.agency}, nationality = #{dto.nationality}, introduction = #{dto.introduction} where id = #{id}
